meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order, Pledge of Allegiance, and Roll Call
Public Comments on Items III – VI
Vote to Approve the September 12th, 2024 Meeting Minutes
U&I Spread the Light Presentation
agenda_items.description: The Director of Veteran Affairs Ed Vonder and Lead Veteran Employment Specialist Lakeydra Houston with U&I Spread the Light will present on their organization and services for veterans. This will be followed up by discussion.

agenda_items.title: Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment Request for Proposal (RFP) Update
agenda_items.description: City staff to provide an update on the status of the Veterans’ Wellbeing RFP and next steps.

agenda_items.title: Follow-up on Dr. Katina Robertson’s Proclamation
agenda_items.description: City staff to provide an update on the status of the proclamation.

agenda_items.title: Fiscal Year 2023/2024 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: City staff will provide a preliminary draft of the Fiscal Year 2023-2024 Annual Report.

agenda_items.title: 2025 Meeting Calendar approval and vote
agenda_items.description: Boards and Commissions along with Room Reservations is asking for the 2025 Calendar year meetings.

agenda_items.title: Announcements
agenda_items.description: Homeless Veteran Stand Down- From 8:00am to 1:30pm on Thursday, October 17 the US Department of Veteran Affairs is hosting this annual event to assist homeless veterans.
